name: Bact
description:
GMTK Game Jam entry. A decent custom controller for movement and some basic gameplay slapped onto it.

HOW TO PLAY

a,d / <--,-->

Turning = Shrinking

Size = Health

Dying is manoeuvring. Taking hits is fighting back.

Push red enemy spawners out of the map. when you're Big.

Dodge enemies and take cover behind blue cells when you're Small.

Reset does not work.
